aws_iot_certificate.description: Creates and manages an AWS IoT certificate.

active.description: Boolean flag to indicate if the certificate should be active

id.description: The internal ID assigned to this certificate.

arn.description: The ARN of the created certificate.

certificate_pem.description: The certificate data, in PEM format.

public_key.description: When no CSR is provided, the public key.

private_key.description: When no CSR is provided, the private key.
